title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.13 - 10/07/2015
body:
**UPDATE - 10/07/15**
Patch 5.13 is now live, you will begin downloading the new update when you login for the first time.

On **10/07/15**, starting at 02:30 AEST (16:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.13. At 04:00 AEST (18:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

**UPDATE - 09/07/15**
We have resolved the issues that were preventing us shipping the patch, and we will be deploying it on Friday morning AEST.

**UPDATE - 08/07/15**

We’ve run into a last-minute issue with patch 5.13 that needs to be fixed before we can ship the new patch out to you. Our original release timeline has been postponed. We’ll update you as soon as we can with information on our progress, as well as a new timeline once it’s been established.

replies.body: anyone having this problem from the patch this morning, when i was watching it update it reached about halfway then the top part of the launcher cut itself off so i cant see the percentage of the download or the launch button, is this normal (just need re-assurance or if it isn't please help :D ).
i spammed backspace now its back to normal but the launch sign isn't there :'(
dw i re-opened it and now its fixed, sorry for the fussssss just wanna finish off my series.
Will corporate mundo be re enabled?
Why isn't this is the client?
